messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

new pas issue with cad sent friday october issue with cad hi have issues viewing projects have values entered cad dollars cad screen can values entered cad but cannot view costs nor can margin total screen can costs but cannot any totals review screen can only profit days profit other under appears converting cad values into could you please advise if known issue we should avoid using cad for thank you officer
